document_data.name: Snapbone
document_data.mainbody:
'''Snapbone''' was a member of [[The Guild]] and a bodyguard of its elected bursar in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{quote|''Your eyes are going to want to wander over all this gold. S'only natural. Just make sure it stops at your eyes, aye?''|Snapbone}}
document_data.Description: Snapbone was a [[human]] man with an olive skin tone, brown hair and facial hair, and chestnut eyes. He wore a [[leather armor]] dyed in [[emerald]]-green â€“ the Guild's telltale colors and was armed with a [[longbow]] and a [[dagger]]
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Snapbone, along with [[Elliot]], was placed to guard the Guild's elected bursar, the masked man only known as [[Uktar (The Guild)|Uktar]]. He continued to serve the bursar and the Guild through the [[Absolute crisis]] and the conflict with the dreaded [[Stone Lord]], a new kingpin who secretly served the [[Absolute]].
